text: Ivan Duane Irwin (March 13, 1927 â€“ February 11, 2019) was an American-born Canadian professional ice hockey defenseman. He played 155 games in the National Hockey League for the New York Rangers and Montreal Canadiens. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. Irwin was raised in Toronto, Ontario. Irwin died in Ajax, Ontario on February 11, 2019 from pneumonia, aged 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:New York Rangers players Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Ice hockey people from Toronto Category:Eastern Hockey League players Category:Ice hockey defencemen
title: Ivan Irwin
